Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Identify Selected Microbial Agents That Cause Acute Febrile Illness
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Nucleic acid extraction (mechanical/chemical lysis, magnetic bead purification)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BIOFIRE FILMARRAY Tropical Fever Panel, a qualitative multiplex PCR assay for detection of select bacterial, viral, and parasitic agents from whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative, multiplex PCR panel for detection and identification of chikungunya virus, dengue virus (1-4), Leptospira spp., and Plasmodium spp. from EDTA whole blood in patients with acute febrile illness or recent exposure, used with BIOFIRE FILMARRAY 2.0 and TORCH Systems.
